Job Posting:173450 - Position: S26 AI & Digital Innovation Associate 2026 Summer Internship 173450 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/01/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 09/17/2025 03:32 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Johnson & Johnson Toronto ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 AI & Digital Innovation Associate 2026 Summer Internship 173450 Co-op Position Markham, ON Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Position: AI & Digital Innovation Associate, Surgical Vision Reports to: Marketing Manager Department: Marketing Requisition number: R-032603 Requisition #: Johnson & Johnson Vision Surgical - AI & Digital Innovation Associate, Surgical Vision Company Overview: Johnson & Johnson, through its operating companies, is the world's most comprehensive and broadly based manufacturer of healthcare products and related services, serving the consumer, pharmaceutical, medical devices, and diagnostics markets. We are dedicated to providing scientifically sound, high-quality products and services to help heal, cure disease, and improve the quality of life. About Johnson & Johnson Vision Surgical: Our bold ambition is to change the trajectory of eye health. We develop solutions for every stage of life-helping people see better, connect better, and live better. Partnering with eye care professionals worldwide, we provide leading products and technologies to address refractive error, cataracts, dry eye, and beyond. We are committed to making quality eye care accessible to everyone, everywhere, using our reach and resources for good. Role Overview: The AI & Digital Innovation Associate will develop strategies to enhance AI integration, driving efficiencies through a data-driven approach. Key responsibilities include identifying processes to implement AI capabilities such as product forecasting, generating market insights, customer and patient education strategies, commercial messaging, and process excellence. The AI & Digital Innovation Associate will collaborate with the commercial team to generate relevant insights, build KPIs, and tailor strategies for the Canadian marketplace. Key Responsibilities • Lead the identification, development, and implementation of innovative AI tools to support business priorities within the cataract portfolio. • Maintain high integrity and self-motivation while leveraging strong analytical skills and a data-driven approach. • Coordinate activities across cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, education, and digital. • Build and sustain relationships with global partners and Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs). • Assess and review AI capabilities and integration processes to identify and capitalize on business opportunities. Create tools to support the use of AI capabilities across the business. • Job Requirements Qualifications & Skills • University degree. • Proven experience in AI implementation and execution. • • Excellent interpersonal, collaboration, and customer-centric skills. Strong judgment, decision-making, and leadership capabilities. • Experience working within agile or scrum-based teams is highly regarded. • Proficiency in data analytics and insight generation. • Experience in joint value creation is preferred. • Strong financial acumen. Bilingualism in English and French is an asset. • Johnson & Johnson is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by federal, state or local law. We actively seek qualified candidates who are protected veterans and individuals with disabilities as defined under VEVRAA and Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act. Johnson and Johnson is committed to providing an interview process that is inclusive of our applicants' needs. If you are an individual with a disability and would like to request an accommodation, please email the Employee Health Support Center (ra- employeehealthsup@its.jnj.com) or contact AskGS to be directed to your accommodation resource. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions APPLICATION LINK: https://www.careers.jnj.com/en/jobs/r-032603/ai-digital-innovation-associate-2026-summer-internship/ Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
